subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Despite fierce wind and frigid temperatures, Masahiro Tanaka looked better than ever, striking out 10 in eight innings while allowing only two hits — both bunt singles — in the Yankees’ win in the first game of a doubleheader.
snippet: Despite fierce wind and frigid temperatures, Masahiro Tanaka looked better than ever, striking out 10 in eight innings while allowing only two hits — both bunt singles — in the Yankees’ win in the first game of a doubleheader.
